      • autoTrigger

        public boolean autoTrigger()
        Set to true if you automatically want to trigger the Actions defined in this ArtContext event if there are no listeners subscribed to this result. Defaults to true.

        As an alternative you can subscribe to this ArtContext by using the ArtContext.onTrigger(Class, TriggerListener) method. Then all actions defined in the config will be executed, unless executeActions() is false.

        See Also:
        executeActions()

      • executeActions

        public boolean executeActions()
        Set to false if you want to prevent the ArtContext from executing any Actions. This only affects actions that would be automatically executed when a Trigger fires and a TriggerListener is attached or autoTrigger() is set to true. Defaults to true.

        You can always bypass this by directly calling one of the ArtContext methods.

      • autoTrigger

        public ArtSettings autoTrigger(boolean autoTrigger)
        Set to true if you automatically want to trigger the Actions defined in this ArtContext event if there are no listeners subscribed to this result. Defaults to true.

        As an alternative you can subscribe to this ArtContext by using the ArtContext.onTrigger(Class, TriggerListener) method. Then all actions defined in the config will be executed, unless executeActions() is false.

        Returns:
        this.
        See Also:
        executeActions()

      • executeActions

        public ArtSettings executeActions(boolean executeActions)
        Set to false if you want to prevent the ArtContext from executing any Actions. This only affects actions that would be automatically executed when a Trigger fires and a TriggerListener is attached or autoTrigger() is set to true. Defaults to true.

        You can always bypass this by directly calling one of the ArtContext methods.

        Returns:
        this.
